songs.title: Attitude
songs.lyrics:
[Cult Days]
Don’t care what they may say
We got that attitude
Don’t care what they may do
We got that attitude

Hey
We got that PMA
Hey
We got that PMA

Don’t care what they may say
We got that attitude
Don’t care what they may do
We got that attitude

Hey
We got that PMA

[Sample: Fisher - "Closer"]
Closer now
Is where you need to be
A little closer now
Is where you need to be
A little closer now... [repeats]

[Cult Days]
Hey
We got that PMA
Hey
We got that PMA

We got that attitude [x2]
Don’t care what they may say
We got that attitude
Don’t care what they may do
We got that attitude [x7]
Now
